title: I Can’t Wait For Nijigaku’s Live! Part 3
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>What the heck~! What the heck~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, Ai-senpai, what are you doing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Is there something wrong....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, no, sorry~. Ai was just practicing for our talk part on the Osaka live. Since we’re going there, Ai thought it would be great to say a few slangs from there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin doesn’t think “what the heck” will come up anywhere in the talk part, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>But it really does give that Osaka feeling.... Ai-san, may I practice with you? I also want to learn the authentic “what the heck” and show it to our fans in Osaka! Join us, Kasumi-san. I want to hear your cute version of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh, really? Geez, then say that sooner~. What the heck~♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oooh! I can feel the Kasukasu-ness!! To be able to color such a short phrase with your personality! You’re amazing, Kasukasu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Who the heck is Kasukasu~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Wow, that was good–!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
